titleStmt.title: A Circular letter to the clergy of Essex to stir them up to double-diligence for the choice of members of their party for the ensuing parliament ; with some queries offered to the consideration of the honest free-holders.
titleStmt.author: H. L.
L. H.

notesStmt.note: Contains, in part, a letter signed: H.L.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
